TopicTitle: 1ST Modded Station in Orbit... What should i do with it?

Articles.Content:
I have a Station here, and i don't know what to do. I have 3KMs of Fuel, and i don't know what to do with it, so I'm asking You instead!

I'm sending up the Crew now, so hurry please.
I suggest that you send it out to Eve and put it in orbit around the planet.

Are you playing in Contract or Sandbox mode? What mods are you using?

If Contract, leave it there and wait for contracts to expand the station and send tourists (I recommend this mod https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/175822-14-15-contract-pack-bases-and-stations-reborn/).

If Sandbox, turn it into an orbital fuel depot by attaching more fuel tanks.
I'm in Sandbox mode. I'll put Fuel tanks and send it to Eve.
I dont use mods however in sandbox mode I would go to jool instead
